item.title: 上海南京路暴动
item.description: http://www.bbc.com/zhongwen/simp/chinese-news-40237604 出台政策保护泡沫经济不会崩，为商者想尽办法钻漏洞唯利是图，想赚ez money的人民利益受损不满意起来闹，然后又得动用媒体封杀消息。 很无奈啊

item.title: Laravel Lifecycle Overview
item.description: ####First Things#### Entry point: public/index.php Key code: //loads the Composer generated autoloader definition require DIR.‘/../bootstrap/autoload.php’; //Retrieve an instance of the app/service container $app = require_once DIR.‘/../bootstrap/app.php’; ####HTTP/Console kernels#### 1. Request comes in kernel 2. Kernal defines an array of bootstrapers who: configure error handling, configure logging, detect the application environment, and perform other tasks that need to be done before the request is actually handled. 3. Kernal defines a list of middleware who: handle read and writing HTTP session, determine maintenance mode, verify CSRF token etc… 4.

item.title: User Agent Note
item.description: User agent Software (a software agent) that is acting on behalf of a user. This term when refering to web browser, is a String (or a line of text) telling a web site information about the browser and operating system. A User-Agent field is included in HTTP header when a browser connects to a website. ###PHP syntax:### $u_agent = $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']; Use of RegExp to identify browsers/OS Something like:
